EmailTemplate.name: Turbofest London 2015.Reminder Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Important Information: Turbofest London
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/register-for-turbofest-london?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbofest_London&utm_content=invite>
Thursday, March 19th 2015 | 12:30 p.m.
The Andaz Liverpool Street Hotel London 40 Liverpool Street London, England, EC2M 7QN
{{Lead.First Name:default=}} {{Lead.Last Name:default=}}
We cannot wait to host you and your colleagues at Turbofest London. Our itinerary features presentations from VMTurbo's founders, executives, and engineers, as well as from companies such as Barclays and SNS Bank. The event will begin with lunch at 12:30, we will then move into presentations from 1:30 to 6:00 and wrap up with a cocktail reception, providing ample time to network until 10:00 p.m. We can't wait to see you there!
Questions Email marketing@vmturbo.com <mailto: marketing@vmturbo.com&subject=Octurbofest Question>
500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
